Description:
Fully-Optioned & Ready to Relish!
In a family-focused quiet neighbourhood this distinctive 4 bedroom residence combines
an exceptional floor plan with impressive inclusions to deliver a ready-made brand new environment of quality, convenience & versatile style.
Beyond the impressive facade, discover a brand new & cleverly zoned interior showcasing a huge master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite with upgraded fixtures & stone bench top with floor to ceiling tiles, 3 large additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & main family striking bathroom also containing floor to ceiling wall tiles. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area is a well- appointed kitchen with 80mm stone benchtops, soft closing draws, dishwasher & plenty of cupboardspace. Other stand-out features include Refrigerated zoned cooling & ducted heating for all seasons comfort, 2700mm high-ceilings, alarm system with video intercom, floating timber flooring throughout, double remote garage with internal access, family sized laundry with added storage, washing machine & stone benches.
Step outside & be greeted by fully landscaped gardens and located in a blue ribbon location, within close proximity to all of Craigieburn amenities, public transport, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central as well as easy access to YMCA childcare, Newbury Primary, Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.

Description:
Family Flexibility in Marvellous Mandalay
An exceptional opportunity for you & your family to enjoy Mandalay's five-star lifestyle
attractions, this single-level residence provides an environment of contemporary quality &
floorplan versatility along with terrific living/entertaining spaces both inside & out.
Bathed in natural light, the home's free-flowing interior showcases a wide entrance hallway
accessing a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, together with 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & stylish main bathroom.
Adding to its fine family credentials is a separate rumpus/kids' retreat, carpeted lounge & spacious open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a sleek stone-top kitchen complete with
breakfast bar, dishwasher, 900mm cooking appliances & walk-in pantry.
Along with ducted heating, split-system air conditioning & ceiling fans to all bedrooms, the
home also features an internally-accessed remote-control double garage, plus stacker doors
(from the living area) to a large al-fresco space with cafe blinds for all-seasons entertaining & backyard.
Close proximity to the golf course, bus stop (on Mandalay Circuit), local parks, extensive walking trails & exclusive use of Club Mandalay facilities, it also offers easy access to Donnybrook Station as well as Craigieburn's schools and shopping centres 15 minutes down the Hume Freeway.
Inspection times -
Private inspections only.
Please contact the selling agent to make an appointment.

Description:
Location..Quality.. Affordability
Nestled in the best pocket of Craigieburn in a friendly, quite, family neighbourhood within short distance to Schools, Parks, Public Transport and Shopping Centres.
This charming home has got everything to offer, including three good size bedrooms, master with stylish ensuite and built-in robe, remaining rooms also with built-in robes. A formal lounge and an open plan family living/dining area comprising of a fully equipped kitchen with ample cupboard space. This area also allows outdoor access to the backyard, generous in space and featuring a great size decking-Perfect for entertaining family and friends!
Enjoy a good size laundry, a stylish central bathroom and a separate toilet plus a single car garage with access to
the home and backyard!
Other features include: stone bench tops to kitchen, bathroom and launderette, high ceilings, downlights, dishwasher, range hood, stainless steel appliances, gas stove and oven, gas hot water service, ducted heating, cooling system, remote controlled garage door, floor boards, carpet, and tiles to the wet areas.
Whether you're buying to live in or looking for an investment, this great opportunity is one not to be missed!
Call Chawki Mallouk today on 0413 370 414 to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Exquisite Style With A Location To Match!
Located in one of Craigieburn's premier estates , this superbly presented home offers spacious family living close to popular schools and shops. The interior boasts dual living zones, open plan kitchen and dining and spacious bedrooms including a master with ensuite and walk in robe.
Comprising of ducted heating & split system cooling, kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/family area, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite featuring double vanity, floating floor boards, quality window furnishings, upstairs rumpus, alarm system, remote control single lock up garage with internal access plus much more.
Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with low maintenance landscaped gardens.
Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland, with all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Brilliant Family Home in Most Desirable Location
Picturesque, light filled and designed for modern day living, this much loved 5 bedrooms family home plus a study will impress even the fussiest of buyers. Built to the highest of standards, this masterpiece spares no expense and with a custom designed layout giving enough room for a growing family.
You will love this immaculately presented home for
Multiple living areas includes formal lounge, family and dining arena
King size master suite with luxury ensuite and walk in robes
Other 3 large bedrooms well serviced by luxurious central bathroom.
Stunning gourmet kitchen offers plenty of bench & cupboard space includes large walk in pantry, top of the range 900 mm cooktops and dishwasher.
Evaporative cooling & ducted heating.
Quality features such as high ceilings maximising the natural light, quality furnishings, floorboards throughout etc.
Spacious outdoor arena with well-maintained backyard. Let your kids or pets run in the safety of their own backyard.
Remote operated double car garage with extra storage space.
The inclusions list is even better, remote operated double garage, security alarm system, concreted backyard and a low maintenance front and backyard plus so much more.
Only a short stroll to Craigieburn Station, Hume tennis court, Aitkin creek primary, Hume library, Splash aquatic centre, Craigieburn central shopping and a short drive to Hume Anglican Grammar, and very easy access to Hume freeway.
An inspection is a must to fully appreciate the quality of this outstanding luxury home and will truly impress. Call now.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Description:
Sensational New Style with Every Aston Advantage
Exceptional modern living, this just-completed home showcases 2 levels of luxury & light providing a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle opportunity in a sought-after Aston neighbourhood.
The feature-packed 25sq* interior boasts 4 bedrooms, 2 master suites with one conveniently placed downstairs, both featuring WIR's and luxurious ensuites, stylish main bathroom & 2 separate powder rooms- one on each level. Add to this, dual living zones, a spacious open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a classy stone-topped kitchen with soft- close cabinetry, 900mm stainless steel appliances & ample storage space.
Other highlights include, zoned ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm & video intercom, floor-to-ceiling tiles in all bathrooms and powder rooms, 4 toilets, stone benchtops throughout (including the laundry), plus low maintenance surrounds, courtyard with synthetic turf & a remote-control double garage.
This remarkable property also enjoys close proximity to the area's renowned schools, a short stroll to a beautiful park and bus stop, minutes away from Craigieburn Central, as well as easy access to Craigieburn Road & Mickleham Road. Simply move in & start living!

Description:
Ideal Investment!!!
Harcourts Roxburgh Park presents 67 Docker Circuit, Mickleham. With bold design and modern inclinations, this single-storey home is stylishly appointed and brilliantly low-maintenance. Nestled within the beautiful Merrifield Estate, this property is perfectly suited for first home buyers, young families or investors.
- Immaculately presented, the home offers an open plan kitchen, meals and family zone, where natural lighting amplifies the neutral colour scheme and the inclusions of laminate timber flooring, ducted heating, evaporative cooling add practicality and comfort.
- The kitchen has been marvelously appointed and will surely impress the home chef with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, stone bench tops and an abundance of storage.
- Three bedrooms include the generous master suite which is located at the front of the home and offers a walk-in-robe and en suite. Two further bedrooms are fitted with built-in robes and are serviced by the central bathroom.
- Additional highlights include a single remote-control garage, separate laundry, down-lights throughout, window furnishings, alfresco, landscaped gardens and much more.
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
A Beautiful Family Home
With an abundance of natural light, character and charm, this great sized family home will appeal to all first home buyers and investors. Located on the border of Roxburgh Park & Craigieburn, this home offers 3 great size bedrooms all with built in robes, Large master bedroom featuring walk in robe and ensuite featuring his and hers separate vanity. A large formal lounge that flows effortlessly to a well-appointed kitchen, as well as with an additional family and meals room perfect for those who like to entertain. Other extras include main bathroom, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double lock up garage with remote-control access to highlight a few. All this and more located within proximity to shopping centres, train stations, local schools and more. Don't miss your chance to inspect this hidden gem, it won't hang around for long!

Description:
Brand Spanking New!
Located in Roxburgh Park most sought after pocket "Arena Estate" with close proximity schools, shops and public transport. This beautiful double storey brand new home offers the space, style and luxury for any family to enjoy!
Comprising wide entrance with high ceilings and tiles running throughout, modern open plan living zone including, good size kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops s/steel appliances that overlooks meals and family area with access to outdoor entertaining area, 4 good size bedrooms (master will full en-suite and all with BIR's), separate study, central bathroom, 3rd toilet downstairs, spacious laundry and double garage,
Fixtures and fittings including: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, alarm system, intercom, dishwasher, kitchen appliances, Caesar stone throughout, high ceilings, high doors, blinds, and much more.
Inspections will impress.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:

If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
MORE LIKE A DOUBLE STOREY HOUSE THAN A TOWNHOUSE!
This Victorian inspired terrace home has something special to offer a first home buyer, downsizer or investor who's looking to feel secure and safe in a quiet local with an enjoyable low maintenance lifestyle.
The extra-spacious layout flows fluently throughout the home, upstairs offers good sized bedrooms with walk in robe, master with ensuite and balcony that overlooks parklands. The light-filled ground level continues with an organized kitchen which looks onto the decked alfresco and spacious backyard, while there's a powder room, separate laundry, fitted storage and remote-control double carport.
A perfect blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort.
Other features include no body corporate, ducted heating, ceiling fans, garden shed, security doors and Holland blinds make this home all the more appealing
When attending the open for inspection please enter via the rear entrance
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*

Description:
Walk To Craigieburn Central
With its spacious floorplan, designer flair & unbeatable location, this two-storey home delivers a lifestyle of low-maintenance luxury with immediate access to the best that Craigieburn has to offer.
This beautiful home showcases an abundance of natural light that includes an open plan meals/living area with a brilliantly well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances & stone bench tops, upstairs study. There are 3 well-proportioned bedrooms, master bedroom with robe & ensuite with your very own balcony and a modern central bathroom.
Flowing effortlessly out back is a GENEROUSLY sized low maintenance backyard perfect for entertaining. Quality features include 3x split system heating & cooling, alarm system, high ceilings and double remote control garage. This gorgeous home will simply leave a smile on your face, all you have to do is move in and enjoy!

Irresistible Potential
The well-maintained garden and neatly cut front lawn immediately signal that this is a much loved family home, which is likely to be the same for the next generation of owners.
Situated on a generous allotment of approx. 658m2, with plenty
of scope to either keep the house and build a unit out the back(STCA) or simply build 3 brand new units (STCA)....there is SO much to work with.
The home comprises of 3 generous size bedrooms, all with built in robes and serviced by a central bathroom. The amazing floorplan includes a renovated open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, ample cupboard space, a living/meals area and a generous size open living.
Extras include: a generous size double garage which could also be used as a work shop , 2 car space carport, heating, cooling, an undercover entertainment area and much, much more.
Do not miss out on this amazing opportunity!

Description:
Position, Privacy and Easy-Living Style
Situated in the highly sought after Trillium Estate & ideal for those looking to nest or invest. Split over two stories and within close proximity to all local amenities, this home will certainly impress!
Downstairs offering spacious living/dining, with a stylish kitchen featuring stone benchtops & stainless steel appliances with dishwasher & ample storage space. Step outside to the sophisticated alfresco area leading out onto the well-manicured backyard, making it the perfect spot for the entire family to entertain and enjoy.
Stroll upstairs where you are greeted with a spacious retreat area & convenient study nook. Master bedroom featuring full ensuite with double his & hers vanities & walk in robe. Additional two bedrooms with built in robes, serviced by a gleaming central bathroom and separate toilet.
Other features include lock up remote controlled double garage, timber floor throughout, fully carpeted bedrooms, comforts of ducted heating & cooling, low maintenance front & rear yards and loads more.
Enjoy living in this magnificent pocket of Trillium and have exclusive access to the architecturally designed 'Club Trillium' leisure centre, fully equipped gym, landscaped courtyard, 25 metre four-lane swimming pool and children's pool, tennis court, well equipped function room, meeting spaces and large entertaining deck set in a landscaped park location.
This will not last long, call now!
Call us today!
Preet Brar 0416 085 144
Shikha Vaid 0414 689 144

Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers and Investors
Situated in the Beautiful Trillium Estate, amongst quality homes and treelined streets, sits this young and modern family home. Features include Great size master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite completed with dual vanities, well appointed kitchen with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances & dishwasher as well as walk in pantry, adjoining meals and family room also both a great size, formal lounge room, generous size main bathroom and more. Not to mention ducted heating, split system cooling, double lock up garage, outdoor decked entertaining area and so much more. This Home has everything you would need looking into the future, an inspection will not disappoint, Call Now To Arrange A Viewing..
Trillium Estate offers its residents exclusive access to Club Trillium. Featuring a fully equipped Gymnasium, 25m heated swimming pool, children's pool, tennis court, function room with kitchen, community garden, FREE Electric Car charging Station to highlight just a few of its many features. Close by to Hume Anglican Grammar, Mickleham Primary School and Mt. Ridley P-12 College. Now connected via Grand Boulevard and only minutes away from Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Centre and Hotel, the Hume Global Learning Centre and local childcare Centres.

Description:
Position, Privacy and Easy-Living Style
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a quality built home in the highly desirable Merrifield Estate. This single-level home delivers a lifestyle/investment opportunity with its generous floor plan, quality inclusions and excellent presentation throughout.
Comprising of three generous sized bedrooms, master with walk in robes & full ensuite. Additional bedrooms both with built in robes, serviced by a sleek central bathroom.
Open-plan living in the heart of the home, modern kitchen with stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard space.
Additional features include the comforts of evaporative cooling & ducted heating, spacious laundry, LED lights throughout, double remote control garage with internal access and much much more.
Impressive convenience with easy access to the upcoming shopping precinct, local schools & parks-inspection is a must!
